datasources.name: GCP Logging
datasources.description: To send logs to logz.io you need provide Google Cloud Function name. When you will run snippet please be sure that is you logged in and assign your profile to relevant project.

telemetries.hint: Switch the toggle on if you want send logs to logz.io though Google Cloud Sink and Google Cloud Pubsub

params.name: functionName
params.label: Name of Google Cloud Function
params.description: Name of cloud function to send logs to logz.io
params.hint: Google Cloud function will be create for parse logs in proper format, right now log
